safeClose(address,uint256,address).details: Burn optionTokens and redeemTokens to withdraw underlyingTokens.

params.optionToken: The address of the option contract.
params.receiver: The underlyingTokens are sent to the receiver address.

safeExercise(address,uint256,address).details: Swaps strikeTokens to underlyingTokens using the strike ratio as the exchange rate.

params.optionToken: The address of the option contract.
params.receiver: The underlyingTokens are sent to the receiver address.

safeMint(address,uint256,address).details: Mint options at a 1:1 ratio with deposited underlying tokens.

params.mintQuantity: Quantity of options to mint and underlyingToken to deposit.
params.optionToken: The address of the option contract.
params.receiver: The newly minted options and redeems are sent to the receiver address.

safeRedeem(address,uint256,address).details: Burns redeemTokens to withdraw available strikeTokens.

params.optionToken: The address of the option contract.
params.receiver: The strikeTokens are sent to the receiver address.

safeUnwind(address,uint256,address).details: Burn redeemTokens to withdraw underlyingTokens and strikeTokens from expired options.

params.optionToken: The address of the option contract.
params.receiver: The underlyingTokens and redeemTokens are sent to the receiver address.

safeClose(address,uint256,address).notice: The redeemTokens to burn is equal to the optionTokens * strike ratio.
